Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 46th overall pick, by West Texas in 1981...
Injured on 7/27/1982 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/12/1983, off Robert Gass (CI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/8/1985, off Clayton Cybulski (TRO)...
Injured on 7/21/1985 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 7/16/1986 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 4 days...
Injured on 5/3/1990 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Plum Grove on 3/1/1991 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 4/27/1991 with a Bruised Foot, out for 3 days...
Injured on 4/30/1991 with a Bruised Finger, out for 4 days...
Signed as a free agent by Lynchburg on 2/4/1992 to a 1-year deal worth $470,000 per year...
